summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Hanford Street, from East Marginal Way to 1st Avenue South, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13951 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
